app.name: Wii Pi Calculator Project
app.long_description:
This application calculates the digits of pi and displays up to 14 decimal places, comparing it against the true expected value to demonstrate the accuracy of the selected calculation method. To exit, use either the Home button on the Wii Remote or the Start button on a GameCube controller.
Originally Developed by: MadCatMk2 Updated by: DeltaResero
